alert.note: Alert for Beltrami; Clearwater (Minnesota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Eastern ND and Grand Forks (Northeastern North Dakota and Northwestern Minnesota)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued May 30 at 5:56PM CDT until May 30 at 6:45PM CDT by NWS Eastern ND and Grand Forks
info.description: The National Weather Service in Grand Forks has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... South central Beltrami County in north central Minnesota... East central Clearwater County in northwestern Minnesota... * Until 645 PM CDT. * At 556 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Solway, or 12 miles west of Bemidji, moving east at 20 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Bemidji, Wilton, Lavinia, Solway, Pinewood, Puposky and Lake Bemidji State Park. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
